QuestData.Title: Westward Bound
QuestData.Description:
Warlord Grimaxe wants us to search west of here for the site of the next ritual.
We could use your help. I've already died once. It's not an experience I'd care to repeat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lana Jordan west of the Horde Camp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lana Jordan west of the Horde Camp.
QuestData.RewardText:
A giant pit filled with necrotic energy and spiders.
I used to hate spiders. Now that I'm Forsaken, I don't think they're all that bad.
They will still definitely kill you, though.
